Module nl.naturalis.common
Package nl.naturalis.common.util

Class SearchReplace

java.lang.Object
nl.naturalis.common.util.SearchReplace
public class SearchReplace extends Object
Global search-and-replace utility that can be used stand-alone (it has a main method) or from within another program.
